cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level dev can learn advanced performance and accessibility patterns from senior dev.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required, but an option for accelerating accessibility work.
cost_optimization: Current team is sufficient and well-balanced.
future_scaling: Can handle a 15-20% increase in workload. Further scaling would require an additional developer.

cross_training_opportunities: Train on basic Terraform and CI/CD to support DevOps.
contractor_augmentation_option: A NestJS contractor could be brought in to parallelize API development if timeline needs to be compressed.
cost_optimization: Single developer is cost-effective, but creates a single point of failure.
future_scaling: Adding a second backend developer would significantly increase parallel development capacity.

cross_training_opportunities: Cross-train backend developer on pipeline maintenance and Terraform basics.
contractor_augmentation_option: An AWS consultant could be engaged for complex security or networking reviews.
cost_optimization: Low utilization suggests this resource may have other project commitments. This must be confirmed.
future_scaling: Current capacity is sufficient for significant project expansion.
